package.description:
wam_msgs: Messages for the WAMros node. These are compiled separately to allow for using the messages on a system where the main node may not itself compile. I.e, one without Xenomai or btclient.
msgs: JointAngles, a variable length float64 array WamStatus, an enumed int srvs: ActivePassive, a variable length binary array MoveToPos, a JointAngle
package.author: Grollman, D'Halluin, Daniel and Stober - EPFL-LASA
